DOC.brief_summary: The previous research one member research team ( H. Miller ) suggest possible influence oral nutrient intake certain fat carbohydrate ( glucose , fructose ) executive control . On hand , another previous study group ( L. Van Oudenhove ) suggest subliminal influence intragastric administration fatty acid subjective neural response negative emotion induction . The purpose study therefore examine effect intragastric administration certain fatty acid carbohydrate executive control healthy volunteer . Therefore two group healthy volunteer invite study . The first group randomly administer one three fatty acid emulsion placebo via nasogastric tube visits， second group receive one two carbohydrate saline random order . After exposure period , participant use computer perform different task measure executive control . During study visit , regular measurement emotion , physical sensation , well blood glucose assess . Furthermore , electrocardiogram continuously record calculation vagal function .
DOC.brief_title: The Effects Intragastric Administration Nutrients Executive Control Healthy Subjects .
DOC.criteria: N = 66 ( n = 36 CAG group ; n = 30 FAG group ) These number base power calculation repeat measure ANOVA one withinsubject factor use Gpower software version 3.1.7 ( http : //www.psycho.uniduesseldorf.de/abteilungen/aap/gpower3 ) , indicate sample size need achieve 90 % power detect mediumsized effect ( f = 0.25 ) . Men & woman Age : > 17 year 20 ≤ BMI ≤ 25 Of good mental physical health Participants one selfreported point exclude : 1 . History , current presence : Psychiatric disorder ( e.g. , anxiety disorder , somatization disorder , eat disorder , depression , substancerelated disorder alcohol abuse dependence etc . ) Abnormal eat behavior ( include restraint emotional eating ) Abdominal/thoracic surgery Neurological , endocrine digestive related disorder Head trauma loss consciousness Other serious medical condition Use drug , include cannabis , past 6 month 2 . Current presence : Pregnancy Medication use affect function gastrointestinal tract and/or affect nervous system , psychotropics painkiller A recent accident surgery fully recover 3 .
